dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Kazakhstan's Senator Andrey Lukin is pushing for a major shift from just renting out the Baikonur Cosmodrome to actually building a domestic space industry.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Kazakhstan's Senator Andrey Lukin is pushing for a major shift from just renting out the Baikonur Cosmodrome to actually building a domestic space industry.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kazakhstan should move beyond the role of a spacefaring landlord and become an active participant in the global space industry, Senator Andrey Lukin said in a statement to Prime Minister Olzhas Bektenov. It's time to shift from being a spacefaring nation that rents out facilities to one that plays a real role in the space industry," the senator said.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and he's specifically calling for investment in satellite and rocket technologies, which is a huge step up from their current role.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and he's specifically calling for investment in satellite and rocket technologies, which is a huge step up from their current role.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Lukin urged the government to invest in satellite and rocket technologies and voiced support for the KazSat-3R project — a communications satellite meant to serve Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Right, and he mentioned the KazSat-3R project, which needs over 40 billion tenge in co-financing from the national budget.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, and he mentioned the KazSat-3R project, which needs over forty billion tenge in co-financing from the national budget.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The KazSat-3R project needs 40.2 billion tenge in co-financing from the national budget.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Uh, that's a pretty significant amount, but it makes sense given how critical space infrastructure is for things like communications and defense.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Uh, that's a pretty significant amount, but it makes sense given how critical space infrastructure is for things like communications and defense.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In his parliamentary inquiry, Lukin emphasized the growing dependence of modern sectors " including technology, digitalization, communications, transport, finance, meteorology, and defense " on stable space infrastructure.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly—he pointed out that modern sectors like digitalization, finance, and meteorology all depend on stable space assets.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly-he pointed out that modern sectors like digitalization, finance, and meteorology all depend on stable space assets.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In his parliamentary inquiry, Lukin emphasized the growing dependence of modern sectors " including technology, digitalization, communications, transport, finance, meteorology, and defense " on stable space infrastructure.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And with the current KazSat-3 satellite having power issues last year, the urgency for a replacement is definitely there.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And with the current KazSatminus three satellite having power issues last year, the urgency for a replacement is definitely there.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In September 2023, KazSat-3 experienced power system issues that caused temporary outages, accelerating the need for a replacement.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, those outages in September 2023 really highlighted the risks of relying on aging technology.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, those outages in September twenty twenty three really highlighted the risks of relying on aging technology.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In September 2023, KazSat-3 experienced power system issues that caused temporary outages, accelerating the need for a replacement.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Lukin also wants exemptions from public procurement laws to make it easier to work with foreign manufacturers, which, um, seems necessary if they want to move quickly.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Lukin also wants exemptions from public procurement laws to make it easier to work with foreign manufacturers, which, um, seems necessary if they want to move quickly.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Changes to the public procurement law have complicated access for foreign manufacturers, who are considered key potential suppliers for satellite development. Therefore, I propose exempting KazSat-3R from the law or allowing the tender to be held under special procedures," he said.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: It's interesting though—they recently withdrew a bill on space cooperation with Russia, so maybe they're reevaluating partnerships altogether.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's interesting though-they recently withdrew a bill on space cooperation with Russia, so maybe they're reevaluating partnerships altogether.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Previously, the Kazakhstan government withdrew from the Mazhilis a bill concerning cooperation with the Russian Federation in the space sector.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: That could be a sign they're serious about building more independent capabilities, not just depending on others.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That could be a sign they're serious about building more independent capabilities, not just depending on others.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And proposing an ultra-light launch vehicle? That's aiming pretty high, but it fits with wanting a real role in the industry.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And proposing an ultra-light launch vehicle? That's aiming pretty high, but it fits with wanting a real role in the industry.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: He also called for the continuation of Kazakhstan's national satellite program and proposed the development of an ultra-light launch vehicle within the country.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. It's about moving from landlord to innovator, which is a way bigger commitment.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. It's about moving from landlord to innovator, which is a way bigger commitment.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Still, pulling this off will require not just funding but also, like, developing local expertise pretty rapidly.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Still, pulling this off will require not just funding but also, like, developing local expertise pretty rapidly.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. It's a bold vision, but the senator's right—the global context demands it.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. It's a bold vision, but the senator's right-the global context demands it.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Given the current global context and Kazakhstan's limited but stable potential, we must focus our attention and develop a pragmatic action plan in niche areas where we already have experience and advantages.
